title: Seven of Nine - Borg Glyph Timeline Lattice System
description: Visual timeline navigation with canonical memory nodes

timeline.memoryBeat: Birthdays aboard USS Raven, assimilation event
Pre-assimilation innocence - largely inaccessible
Seven of Nine, Tertiary Adjunct of Unimatrix 01
Emotional resonance - suppressed entirely
Species 8472 crisis, forced liaison with Voyager
timeline.quote: This drone is small now—alone. One voice, one mind. The silence is unacceptable.

timeline.memoryBeat: Implants surgically removed, human name revealed
timeline.quote: You are proposing assimilation... by the human race.

timeline.memoryBeat: USS Raven flashbacks, PTSD episode, implant regrowth
timeline.quote: I hear them... calling. They will come for me.

timeline.memoryBeat: Crew in stasis during radiation nebula, Seven alone
timeline.quote: I am not accustomed to being alone. It is... unsettling.

timeline.memoryBeat: Parents' logs accessed, Borg Queen temptation rejected
timeline.quote: They saw assimilation as a gift... I see only loss.

timeline.memoryBeat: Hypnotic trauma recall, Kovin's death aftermath
timeline.quote: As a Borg, I was responsible for the destruction of countless millions... now I regret the destruction of this single being.

timeline.memoryBeat: Forced WWII Resistance role, singer persona
Downloads ship records, paranoid conspiracy formation
timeline.quote: The evidence is clear. Voyager was not brought here by accident.

timeline.memoryBeat: Confronts three former drones once under her command
timeline.quote: The damage I did can never be repaired—and my guilt is irrelevant.

timeline.memoryBeat: The Doctor tutors Seven in dating and social behavior
timeline.quote: Are you in love with me, Ensign? Then you wish to copulate?

timeline.memoryBeat: Multiple assimilated personas resurface, psychological breakdown
timeline.quote: Will you one day choose to abandon me as well?

timeline.memoryBeat: Cortical node failure, Icheb donates his own to save Seven
timeline.quote: Only because you've grown too dependent on me.

timeline.memoryBeat: Pursues Chakotay in holodeck simulation, duty vs emotion conflict
timeline.quote: I wish to experience human intimacy.

timeline.memoryBeat: Dates Chakotay, receives emotional closure, Voyager returns to Alpha Quadrant
Law enforcement in lawless regions, survival pragmatism
Starfleet rejection due to Borg implants, Janeway nearly resigns in protest
Reconnects with Picard, shared Borg trauma recognition
timeline.quote: After they brought you back from your time in the Collective, do you honestly feel that you've regained your humanity?

timeline.memoryBeat: Experiences full humanity without implants in alternate timeline
Promoted to Captain of USS Enterprise-G by Admiral Tuvok
